title: 7: The Glass Hotel
itunes:title: The Glass Hotel
description: The Readheads are discussing the most complex and polarizing book choice yet, The Glass Hotel by Emily St. James Mandel. Join us as Jackie, Dana, Becky & Snitch break down the major themes of the book and discuss the moments and quotes that stuck out most to them. As always they're sharing who should play the characters in a Hollywood adaption of the book and discussing other titles they read this week. The next book is Jackie's choice and she chose Code Name Hélène by Ariel Lawhon. Follow @thereadheads on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thereadheads/ Join our Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/thereadheads/ Submit a question or comment to us at thereadheadsbookclub@gmail.com The overall Readheads Rating for The Glass Hotel is 3.575 stars.
